title: Martín Alonso
text:
Martín Alonso (born 2 December 1999) is a Spanish <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> <a href="Winger%20%28rugby%20union%29">winger</a> and he currently plays for <a href="Stade%20Rochelais">La Rochelle</a> in the French <a href="Top%2014">Top 14</a>.
Considered one of Spanish rugby's biggest hopes, he is an international with both <a href="Spain%20national%20rugby%20sevens%20team">7's</a> and <a href="Spain%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">XV</a> sides.
